direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve historical data related to loan operations but focus on different aspects (repayment vs. borrowing).
Both methods handle loan repayment history, but flexibleLoanRepayHistory is specific to flexible loans.
Both methods interact with loan-related data and modify loan terms, though they serve different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require loan data initialization before execution.
Environment setup is required before accessing loan repayment history.
Both methods verify loan repayment details and handle similar exceptions.
